name: Now I know my ABCs
overview: A fun way to learn the alphabet. Now I Know My ABC's is a fun and interactive way to learn the alphabet. Using the Touch Screen on the Wii U GamePad your goal is to write every letter in both lowercase and uppercase. Each letter is associated with a color. You can press the letter's icon at anytime to hear how the letter is pronounced. After you complete writing a letter the crowd cheers for you, giving positive reinforcement to help encourage the learning of even more letters!
